Level up {1}{B} [i]({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)[/i] [4/2]
[level 1-2] When this creature dies, put its counters on another target creature you control with level up. [5/3]
[level 3+] When this creature dies, put its counters on each creature you control with level up. [6/4]
